data.title: General Hospital star Cameron Mathison and wife Vanessa announce divorce after 22 years of marriage
data.meta_description: General Hospital star Cameron Mathison and wife have announced they are divorcing after 22 years of marriage
data.text:
Cameron Mathison and Vanessa Mathison are splitting up.

The General Hospital star, 54, and his wife, 57, have announced their divorce in a joint statement on Instagram on Wednesday, July 31. This comes just four days after the pair's 22nd wedding anniversary. The statement read: "After 22 years of marriage, we have made the difficult decision to part ways. We enter this new chapter with deep love, kindness, and respect for each other. We hold gratitude in our hearts for the wonderful years we shared together."

The statement continued "Our children have been and will continue to be our highest priority, and we will forever share in our devotion and love for them. We remain friends, and both wish the best for one another. We sincerely appreciate your respect for our family’s privacy during this transition.

With the written statement came a series of three photos of the pair holding each other and smiling. Cameron and Vanessa met each other for the first time as working models in New York City in 1998. They started dating the following the year and married on July 27, 2002.

The share two children together son Lucas who was born in April 2003 and daughter Leila born in July 2006. Before the divorce announcement, the soap star posted a carousel of photos on July 30 mourning the fact he's daughter will be leaving the house now to head to college, making the house empty.

The "summer photo dump" was captioned: "Summer photo dump. Last few weeks before I’m an official empty nester." The photo featured both children and their summer adventures including hiking and eating sweet treats, noticeable Vanessa was not in any of the 10 photos. Many fans commented, asking about her absence, for example: "Where’s Vanessa? Hope she’s ok"

Previously, the two talked to Entertainment Tonight about acting together in 2022. Vanessa guest-starred on General Hospital as an executive coach named Mia for three episodes. Cameron has been on since 2021 playing Drew Cain. He was on All My Children prior from 1998-2011 playing Ryan Lavery.

"We've been married 20 years coming up this summer, and it hasn’t all been smooth, for sure. We went through rocky times the first five years," Cameron said, reflecting on their marriage in the ET interview.

"Getting through those times, and getting to call Vanessa my best friend and fully enjoy every moment together, it’s been better than I could have ever imagined marriage being for me," he added.

The 54-year-old in an appearance on Cheryl Burke's Sex, Lies and Spray Tans podcast on July 22, mentioned about a previous struggle the couple faced. Cameron confessed during his time on Dancing with the Stars, he had concerns about working with pro Edyta Śliwińska.

"Vanessa was a trooper," he explained. "We'd sort of recently gone through a bunch of stuff, and it wasn't great timing and I was off in LA spending time with this beautiful woman dressed up, against her, sweating with her five hours a day rehearsing, and then doing all the press and touring stuff together, and it was really hard."
